session_id.Description: BIDS session ID indicating when data was collected

mock_fmri_complete_check.Description: Researcher indication about mock fmri protocol was completed

mock_fmri_notes.Description: Researcher notes about mock fmri protocol

mri_anatomy_complete_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether MPRage was completed

mri_food_run_1_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 1 of food view task was completed

mri_food_run_2_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 2 of food view task was completed

mri_food_run_3_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 3 of food view task was completed

mri_food_run_4_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 4 of food view task was completed

mri_food_viewing_notes.Description: Researcher notes about food viewing task

mri_sst_run_1_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 1 of SST was completed

mri_sst_run_2_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 2 of SST was completed

mri_sst_run_3_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 3 of SST was completed

mri_sst_run_4_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 4 of SST was completed

mri_sst_run_5_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 5 of SST was completed

mri_sst_run_6_check.Description: Researcher indication about whether run 6 of SST was completed

cams_pre_mri.Reference: Ersig AL, Kleiber C, McCarthy AM, Hanrahan K. Validation of a clinically useful measure of children's state anxiety before medical procedures. J Spec Pediatr Nurs. 2013 Oct;18(4):311-9. doi: 10.1111/jspn.12042. Epub 2013 Jun 25. PMID: 24094126; PMCID: PMC4282760.

cams_post_mri.Reference: Ersig AL, Kleiber C, McCarthy AM, Hanrahan K. Validation of a clinically useful measure of children's state anxiety before medical procedures. J Spec Pediatr Nurs. 2013 Oct;18(4):311-9. doi: 10.1111/jspn.12042. Epub 2013 Jun 25. PMID: 24094126; PMCID: PMC4282760.

freddy_pre_snack.Description: Pre-snack fullness rating on a 150 mm visual analgue scale
freddy_pre_snack.Reference: Keller KL, Assur SA, Torres M, Lofink HE, Thornton JC, Faith MS, Kissileff HR. Potential of an analog scaling device for measuring fullness in children: development and preliminary testing. Appetite. 2006 Sep;47(2):233-43. doi: 10.1016/j.appet.2006.04.004. Epub 2006 Jul 7. PMID: 16828929.

freddy_post_snack.Description: Post-snack fullness rating on a 150 mm visual analgue scale
freddy_post_snack.Reference: Keller KL, Assur SA, Torres M, Lofink HE, Thornton JC, Faith MS, Kissileff HR. Potential of an analog scaling device for measuring fullness in children: development and preliminary testing. Appetite. 2006 Sep;47(2):233-43. doi: 10.1016/j.appet.2006.04.004. Epub 2006 Jul 7. PMID: 16828929.

Potential of an analog scaling device for measuring fullness in children: development and preliminary testing. Appetite. 2006 Sep;47(2):233-43. doi: 10.1016/j.appet.2006.04.004. Epub 2006 Jul 7.
